gamemodes.name: Hardcore Mode
rules: You may only purchase 88 extra Bank Spaces from the Shop.
Harsher penalties applied against you in Combat.
No Passive Hitpoint Regeneration.
gamemodes.description: For those who enjoy risk, and are not afraid to lose your Character. This is not for new players.

gamemodes.name: Adventure Mode
rules: Skills are locked and must be purchased using GP to access.
Non-Combat Skill Levels cannot go above your Combat Level.
Start with only Melee Combat Skills, a Bronze Weapon and 10 Basic Food.
Harsher penalties applied against you in Combat.
HP, Damage and Food Healing values are 10x larger than Standard.
gamemodes.description: For experienced Melvor Idle players. A completely different experience for you to enjoy.

gamemodes.name: CHAOS MODE
rules: Item Corruption Unlocked.
25% Reductions on Attack Intervals and Skill Intervals (Multiplicative).
All Enemies have at least 1 random Passive.
All equipped items lost on death.
BIG NUMBERS
Golbin Raid is not available.
Harsher penalties applied against you in Combat.
Do not fight a Chicken.
gamemodes.description: How fast can you beat the game? Have a go with this calm & peaceful Melvor Idle experience.

gamemodes.name: Hardcore Adventure Speedrun
rules: YOUR GOAL - DEFEAT THE FINAL BOSS AS FAST AS POSSIBLE.
+100% Maximum Hitpoints for you and the Enemies.
-80% Attack Interval for you and the Enemies.
-80% Skill Intervals.
+800% Global Mastery XP.
-2s Monster Respawn Timer
No HP Regeneration
Adventure Mode rules apply.
Stability not guaranteed.

gamemodes.name: Internal Suffering Speedrun Mode
rules: YOUR GOAL - DEFEAT THE FINAL BOSS AS FAST AS POSSIBLE.
!!! HARDCORE COMBAT TRIANGLE IS REVERSED !!!
All Skills except Firemaking & Farming are unlocked in the beginning.
Your Skill level is capped at Level 10. This cap can be increased by permanently disabling any Non-Combat Skill (Max 10, not including Firemaking or Farming).
Each disabled Skill increases the Skill Level cap by 10.
You can disable Skills at any time.
-80% Attack Interval for you and the Enemies.
-80% Skill Intervals.
+800% Global Mastery XP.
-2s Monster Respawn Timer.
Final Boss requires Level 99 in all Combat Skills to access.
Larger numbers
Stability not guaranteed.

gamemodes.name: Hardcore Combat Only Speedrun
rules: YOUR GOAL - DEFEAT THE FINAL BOSS AS FAST AS POSSIBLE.
All non-Combat Skills are permanently disabled.
-80% Attack Interval for you and the Enemies.
-2s Monster Respawn Timer
+10% Flat Slayer Area Effect Negation
No HP Regeneration
Hardcore Mode Combat Triangle.
Stability not guaranteed.

tutorialStages.name: Ranged Preparation 1
tutorialStages.description: Let's try a different style of Combat - Ranged. For this, you need a Bow and some Arrows. Gather some basic resources so we can get you started on Ammo.

tutorialStages.name: Ranged Preparation 2
tutorialStages.description: When making Arrows, you need Arrowtips. These can be created in Smithing. 1 Bar produces 15 Arrowtips.

tutorialStages.name: Ranged Preparation 3
tutorialStages.description: We are now going to start the process of creating Arrows. Feathers are required, so let's buy some from the Shop before we move on.

tutorialStages.name: Ranged Preparation 4
tutorialStages.description: Arrows are then created in Fletching and require Arrow Shafts, Headless Arrows & Arrowtips (on top of the Feathers) to produce. Arrow Shafts produce a minimum of 15 from a Normal Log. This increases when using higher level Logs from Woodcutting.

tutorialStages.name: Ranged Preparation 5
tutorialStages.description: It is time to create our Bow. To do so, we need some Bowstring. This can be purchased in the Shop alongside many other Materials and Upgrades.

tutorialStages.name: Ranged Preparation 6
tutorialStages.description: The last step, making our Normal Shortbow. First, create the Normal Shortbow (U) and then the beautiful Normal Shortbow.

tutorialStages.name: Ranged Preparation 7
tutorialStages.description: It's time to equip our new Items. This is done in the Bank just like before.

tutorialStages.name: Ranged Preparation 8
tutorialStages.description: Time to test out your new Bow & Arrows. Defeat some Chickens using Ranged.

tutorialStages.name: Magic Preparation 1
tutorialStages.description: Another approach to Combat is via the use of Magic. Magic Combat Spells use many different types of  Runes that are created in Runecrafting. All Runes require Rune Essence to make, which is obtained in Mining. Let's do that first before we move on.

tutorialStages.name: Magic Preparation 2
tutorialStages.description: This is where you create all the Runes needed for Magic Combat Spells.

tutorialStages.name: Magic Preparation 3
tutorialStages.description: The use of Magic Spells require a Magic Weapon to be equipped. Lucky we gave you one earlier. Equip it to enable Combat Magic.

tutorialStages.name: Magic Preparation 4
tutorialStages.description: Time to test out your new Spells. Slay a Golbin using a Magic Combat Spell. You can select this in the Combat Screen.
